title: The Chemistry of Music
medium: Set of seventeen cut-and-pasted printed paper (seven with transfer type, one with ink, one with cut-and-pasted gelatin silver print and transfer type with ink additions, and five with transfer type and ink additions) on paper, one transfer type and ink on paper, and one postcard with transfer type and ink
dimensions: sheet (each, orientation varies): 7 13/16 x 9 15/16" (19.9 x 25.2 cm)
credits: The Gilbert and Lila Silverman Fluxus Collection Gift
